errors.alreadyPerformedAction: You have already performed an action

messages.suspectNotBad: but clearly this person is not bad

Bully.default: Block the action of the target.

Doctor.default: Syringe: cure (remove toxins) for the target. Bandage: stop bleeding (save) for the target.

Hunter.default: Set a trap for the target.

Stalker.default: See who has the same target as you.
Stalker.bad: See who has the same target as you. Can kill the target.

Witch.good: Has two potions: antidote to cure toxins, and poison to poison a player.
Witch.bad: Has two potions: poison to poison a player, and paralysis to prevent a player from using skills.
Witch.mad: Has two potions: antidote to cure toxins, and poison to poison a player.

Villager.default: Randomly selects a role with the mad trait.

errors.playerCountInvalid: Player count must be a positive number
errors.rolesCountInvalid: Roles count must be equal to player count
errors.traitsCountInvalid: Traits count must be equal to player count
errors.traitsGoodCountMissing: Traits good count must be at least 1
errors.traitsGoodCountNotHalf: Traits good count must be less than half of the player count
errors.traitsBadCountMissing: Traits bad count must be at least 1
errors.traitsBadCountNotHalf: Traits bad count must be less than half of the player count
errors.alivePlayersInvalid: Alive players must be a positive number
errors.voteCountInvalid: Vote count must be a positive number

messages.gameOverBadTraitsMissing: Game over because there are no bad traits
messages.gameOverBadTraitsDominant: Game over because the bad traits are dominant

messages.gameSummaryPrompt: You are an administrator of an online game called `Mad Village`, explain the gameplay and tips (for both villagers and werewolves) of this game to the players. Here is the description of the game: The game will keep the basic structure of the classic `Werewolf` game but with an important change in the characteristics of the villagers. Instead of having only one group of villagers, I divided them into two types: good villagers and crazy villagers. Good villagers, who are the positive side, can perform special skills. Bad villagers, who are the werewolves representing the negative side, will be able to perform more skills than villagers. Crazy villagers, who are also positive but their skills will not be effective. The game structure will be divided into the following stages: Night stage: In this stage, players will choose a target to perform their actions. Day Phase: The results of the actions during the night will be reported to all players. Discussion Phase: Players will be allowed to chat and discuss the events that happened during the night, finding out who the bad villagers are. Voting Phase: Players will vote for who they think is the bad person, and the person with the most votes will be hanged. The game ends when one of the following conditions is met: The number of villagers is less than or equal to the number of werewolves; There are no more werewolves in the game.

errors.notCreatedAccountYet: You haven't created account yet or maybe your account was deleted!

errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests, please try again in a few minutes
